sentences: Lõuna-Eesti maa on künklik ja kaunis.
context: 'Maad' is the partitive singular and nominative plural form of the Estonian word 'maa'. As a partitive singular, it can refer to 'some land', 'part of the earth', or 'portion of ground'. As a nominative plural, it means 'lands', referring to multiple plots of land or countries. The word 'maa' itself has extensive meanings including planet Earth, soil/ground, surface area, country, and territory.
